      static double calculateDistance(java.util.List<WiFiMeasurement> wiFiMeasurements, java.util.List<WiFiMeasurement> storedAPMeasurements)
      Calculates the distance of a current WiFi measurement to the stored storedAPMeasurements to find out the lowest value and thereby closest location to the current measurements.

      Returns the minimum entry of the placeDistanceMap
      static double securityValue(double distanceAtOnePlace, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> placeDistanceMap)
      The security value is the sum of deviations between the distance of one specific place and all the other ones in the placeDistanceMap.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateDistance

        public static double calculateDistance(java.util.List<WiFiMeasurement> wiFiMeasurements,
                                       java.util.List<WiFiMeasurement> storedAPMeasurements)
        Calculates the distance of a current WiFi measurement to the stored storedAPMeasurements to find out the lowest value and thereby closest location to the current measurements.
        Parameters:
        wiFiMeasurements - the currently scanned measurements
        storedAPMeasurements - the stored access point measurement of the WiFi access points
        Returns:
        the double of the sum of distance between the stored RSSI and the current one for all storedAPMeasurements

      • minMapValue

        public static java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> minMapValue(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> placeDistanceMap)
        Returns the minimum entry of the placeDistanceMap
        Parameters:
        placeDistanceMap - the map containing the distance to all places from the last position of the measurement
        Returns:
        the minimum entry of the placeDistanceMap

      • securityValue

        public static double securityValue(double distanceAtOnePlace,
                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> placeDistanceMap)
        The security value is the sum of deviations between the distance of one specific place and all the other ones in the placeDistanceMap.
        Parameters:
        distanceAtOnePlace - the distance for one specific place
        placeDistanceMap - the place distance map that the single gets compared to
        Returns:
        the double value of the sum of deviation, also called "security value"
